content:
Sierra Yarn also offers a product called Big Cotton Chunky, which is a yarn made of 100% Pima cotton. The yarn is described as being similar to the feeling of clouds and the perfect yarn to knit with. The yarn has been made using airjet technology, making it lightweight and easy to knit with. It is also machine washable and dryable.

The benefits of this yarn include being super lightweight, having more yards than regular chunky yarns, made with extremely high-quality fibers, and the softness of Pima cotton. The yarn specifications are 100% Pima cotton, suitable for knitting and crochet, with a ball weight of 3.5oz, 100gr, chunky yarn weight, and 155Yds (141mt) of yarn length, needles US 10 (6mm) or bigger, and is machine washable and dryable.

This yarn is versatile and perfect for knitting anything in almost no time, such as beanies, scarfs, or even a blanket. Sierra Yarn provides you with the finest yarn, and it is up to the knitter to turn it into the perfect garment.
